ComicInfo.Series: Grimm Fairy Tales Steampunk: Alice in Wonderland One-Shot
ComicInfo.Summary:
The Wonderland ongoing series may have ended but that isn't the end of Alice.
An alternate dimension is emerging in the Grimm Universe and what better place to explore it could there be than by going through the looking glass.
This new Alice in Wonderland tale expands on the story that began in the Grimm Fairy Tales Steampunk Mini-series.
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- A | Cover A | Renato Rei & Wes Hartman | 1 | B | Cover B | Daniel Leister & Aaron Best | 2 | C | Cover C | Mike Krome & Ula Mos | 3 | D | Cover D | Jose Luis & Sanju Nivangune | 4 | E | Retailer In-Store Exclusive Variant Cover, Limited to 100 | Jamie Tyndall (a) & Ula Mos (c) | Missing |
